## Task 3
```{r}
plot(1, xlim = c(0,100), ylim = c(0,100), type = "n")

angles <- seq(0, 2 * pi, 0.1)
x3 <- cos(angles)*40 + 50
y3 <- sin(angles)*40 + 60
polygon(x3,y3)
```

## Task 4
```{r}
plot(1, xlim = c(0,100), ylim = c(0,100), type = "n")

angles <- seq(0, 2 * pi, 0.1)
x4 <- cos(angles)*(40*abs(sin(angles))) + 25
y4 <- sin(angles)*(40*abs(sin(angles))) + 40
polygon(x4,y4, col = "tomato")
```
